ch0212_00_banjiro/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! What took
you so long! I’ve been waiting for you!
ch0212_00_banjiro/0101_0701_02_10:
We’re gonna compete with each other today.
And see who’s stronger!
ch0212_00_banjiro/7101_0701_01_10: Hey! Did you know Alder’s my gramps?
ch0212_00_banjiro/7101_0701_02_10: He’s really strong, but so am I!
ch0212_00_banjiro/7102_0701_01_10:
Gramps was right—there really are a lot of
tough-smelling Trainers here!
ch0212_00_banjiro/7102_0701_02_10:
But I’m gonna beat them all and be the
strongest!
ch0212_00_banjiro/7103_0701_01_10:
Hey! There aren’t any wild Pokémon on
Pasio, right?
ch0212_00_banjiro/7103_0701_02_10: I had no idea when I first got here!
ch0212_00_banjiro/7103_0701_03_10:
So I ended up throwing a ball at someone’s
lost Pokémon.
ch0212_00_banjiro/7103_0701_04_10:
I couldn’t catch it, and it was way too strong
for a wild Pokémon, so I remember thinking
something was off.
ch0212_00_banjiro/7104_0701_01_10: All the Champions look super strong!
ch0212_00_banjiro/7104_0701_02_10:
You can tell they’ve been through a lot with
their Pokémon!
ch0212_00_banjiro/7104_0701_03_10:
We still have a long way to go to get
even stronger!
ch0212_00_banjiro/7105_0701_01_10:
Grampa Alder always asks me what I plan
to do after becoming strong.
ch0212_00_banjiro/7105_0701_03_10:
Honestly, I have no idea! It’s too much to
think about.
ch0212_00_banjiro/7105_0701_04_10:
First, I’ll become the strongest. Then I’ll
figure out the rest!
ch0212_00_banjiro/1701_0702_01_10:
Get even stronger, OK? Then we’re gonna
battle!
ch0212_00_banjiro/2501_0701_01_10: I’ll admit, you really are strong!
ch0212_00_banjiro/2501_0701_02_10: I wanna battle you! But not just yet!
ch0212_00_banjiro/2501_0701_03_10:
This time, I’m the one who hasn’t been
through enough!
ch0212_00_banjiro/2501_0702_01_10:
I’m gonna face a whole lot more on Pasio,
just like you!
ch0212_00_banjiro/2501_0702_02_10:
The people you’ve battled! And the places
you’ve been!
ch0212_00_banjiro/2501_0702_03_10: Just thinking about it makes me excited!
ch0212_00_banjiro/2511_0701_01_10:
Gramps always tells me how wonderful it
is to walk toward the future together with
Pokémon.
ch0212_00_banjiro/2511_0701_02_10: It’s pretty obvious to Trainers on Pasio.
ch0212_00_banjiro/2511_0701_03_10:
That’s why there are so many strong Trainers
here! I’ve never been anywhere like this!
ch0212_00_banjiro/2511_0702_01_10:
When it comes to working with Pokémon as
a team, I’m second to none.
ch0212_00_banjiro/2511_0702_02_10: That’s ’cause Gramps has been teaching me!
ch0212_00_banjiro/3001_0701_01_10:
Come on! Pull yourself together! It’s boring if you
keep dawdling!
ch0212_00_banjiro/3003_0701_01_10:
Hey! Hey!! Hey!!! We promised, remember?
Let’s do some training together!
ch0212_00_banjiro/3005_0701_01_10:
Gramps will get angry at you if you stay up
too late, OK?
